articles.title: Gold price rises as Fed rate cut hopes grow - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price advanced on Monday after achieving three weeks of consecutive gains, yet exchanges hands off daily high after the Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell stuck to its rhetoric, failing to provide forward guidance.
articles.content:
• Gold extends gains for a third week, rising 0.51% to $2,422.
